localization_pack.title: Bizpanda localization
localization_pack.description: The language pack for the plugin.

paylocker.title: Paylocker addon
paylocker.description: The add-on is built on the social lock platform, it performs blocking of paid content. It is possible to generate tariff tables, step-by-step registration and payment.

popup_mode.title: Popup mode addon
popup_mode.description: This modification allows the use of conventional locks in the pop-up window mode.

migration_rus_to_en.title: Social Locker Migration
migration_rus_to_en.description: This modification extends the functionality of the old plug-in, adds new tools, the capabilities transferred from the russian version.

step_to_step.title: Step to step addon
step_to_step.description: This modification allows you to create step-by-step tasks.

buttons_pack.title: Social Locker buttons pack
buttons_pack.description: This modification extends the package of social buttons.

name: pandalocker
title: BizPanda Lockers
site:
